name: automattic/vipwpcs
description: PHP_CodeSniffer rules (sniffs) to enforce WordPress VIP minimum coding conventions

scripts-descriptions.lint: VIPCS: Lint PHP and XML files in against parse errors.
scripts-descriptions.cs: VIPCS: Check the code style and code quality of the codebase via PHPCS.
scripts-descriptions.test: VIPCS: Run the unit tests for the VIPCS sniffs.
scripts-descriptions.test-coverage: VIPCS: Run the unit tests for the VIPCS sniffs with coverage enabled.
scripts-descriptions.test-ruleset: VIPCS: Run the ruleset tests for the VIPCS sniffs.
scripts-descriptions.feature-completeness: VIPCS: Check if all the VIPCS sniffs have tests.
scripts-descriptions.check: VIPCS: Run all checks (lint, CS, feature completeness) and tests.
